sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { useUsers } from '../../hooks/users'; import Button from '../Button'; import { Container, Topside, Logo, MenuButton, HomeIcon, BellIcon, FavoriteIcon, ProfileIcon, EmailIcon, Botside, Avatar, ProfileData, ExitIcon, } from './styles'; const MenuBar: React.FC = () => { const { setLoggedUser, loggedUser } = useUsers(); return ( Pagina Inicial Notificações Mensagens Favoritados Perfil {loggedUser?.completeName} {`@${loggedUser?.username}`} { setLoggedUser(null); }} /> ); }; export default MenuBar;
